long: Ctrl+Shift+P to search for all the registered commands
Execute 'Show workflow graph' to visualize, edit and run the workflow.
Each sub-window has a window menu tool button in the top-left corner.
Some sub-windows have a model menu tool button in the top-left corner.
Sub-windows can be resized by wheeling the mouse over the title bar.
Ctrl+Drag to move the internal data of the sub-windows.
Ctrl+Drag a sub-window and drop it to the tab bar will move it to the destination.
Save the application state as a session so you can restore it later.
Ctrl+Comma to customize the application settings in the settings window.
